TOП

Spray only what you need



About Us


A startup based in Astana, Kazakhstan; our team aims to solve three problems faced by agriculture in Kazakhstan.


1. Billions of dollars are spent on herbicides to fight with weeds.

2. Weeds get resistant to herbicides, due to usage in high doses.

3. Herbicides largely contribute to human health problems and water, soil, and air contamination.

Advisors


Prof. Avital Bechar
Head of Department of Institute of Agricultural Engineering in Tel-Aviv

Targeted Herbicide Sprayer based on Computer Vision

Targeting plants that need herbicides, **saves 60%** of herbicides.
Empowered by **state-of-the-art computer visison** technologies, our product: - Environment Friendly - Saves Time - Saves Money - Saves Resources

June 2018

Our CEO, Miras, has been invited to participate in Google Campus Tel Aviv Exchange Program for Startups.
